trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Chattanooga
There were no other sightings in Chattanooga on or around November 25th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsWITNESSED BY MY WIFE ALSO WHILE STANDING ON OUR DECK - LOOKING AT THE BEAUTIFUL CLEAR SKY NOTICED THE TWO OBJECTS BECAUSE OF THEIR BRIGHTNESS - MY WIFE GOT THE BINOCCULARS JUST INSIDE THE DOOR - COULD NOT SEE ANY SHAPE JUST TWO VERY BRIGHT LIGHTS WITH NO STROBES AT ALL - THERE WAS A JET TRAVELING IN THE SAME DIRECTION BEHIND THE TWO LIGHTS AT JUST LESS THAN THEIR SPEED - ALSO ANOTHER JET IN FRONT OF THEM TRAVELING IN STRAIGHT TOWARD THEM. I AM A PILOT AND I KNOW THESE TWO AIRCRAFT HAD TO SEE THE LIGHTS - AS THEY REACHED THE EASTERN SKY THE WHITE LIGHT TURNED TO ORANGE AND JUST DISAPPEARED WHILE STILL IN THE AIR - THEY DID NOT FALL OVER THE HORIZON - THIS TRANSFORMATION OF LIGHT TOOK MAYBE 15 SECONDS AND THEY WERE GONE. THESE WERE NOT AIRCRAFT - THEY DISAPPEARED.
Summary: TWO WHITE STARLIKE OBJECTS ABOVE 20K FT ONE FOLLOWING THE OTHER AS IF IN FORMATION - TRAVELING NNW TO E - SPEED 600KNOTS PLUS - CHANGED COLOR FROM WHITE TO ORANGE IN EAST AND DISAPPERED
